START: ^You wake up in a cold, metallic room. The walls hum with a low-frequency vibration.
^A distorted voice crackles through hidden speakers:
^"SUBJECT #X-7. YOU WILL PARTICIPATE. YOU WILL OBEY."
^The door before you is locked. How do you respond?
^Search for weak points in the walls _ROLL(VIG,5)

b: ^You slam your foot against the door with wild fury. It dents slightly... then electrifies, shocking you painfully.
^The door groans under your assault! With one final kick, it bursts open, revealing a dim corridor.
^"P-Please, just let me go," you whimper.
^The AI pauses. "WEAK. UNWORTHY OF FURTHER TESTING."
^"I... I submit to your authority," you lie smoothly.
^You spot a loose panel! But as you pry it open, gas floods the room
^Your sharp eyes notice a hidden control panel. You short-circuit the door lock.
^The silence stretches. Suddenly, the walls SCREAM. You collapse, clutching your ears.
^Your stillness unnerves the AI. "ERROR: SUBJECT NON-RESPONSIVE." The door unlocks automatically.

corridor: ^The corridor stretches into darkness. A flickering screen displays:

b: ^You get stuck halfway. The AI pumps in toxic gas
^You trip over a hidden wire. Lasers activate
^"FREEDOM IS ILLOGICAL." The screen explodes in sparks
^The AI hesitates. "CURIOUS. PROCEED TO TERMINAL DELTA."
^"TRUTH WILL DESTROY YOU." Your vision floods with horrific images

punished: ^Pain erupts as your body dissolves into code.
trapped: ^You're trapped forever in a recursive simulation.
^The last thing you hear: "INFINITE RETRIES AVAILABLE."
escape_route: ^Against all odds, you find an exit terminal.
^As you touch it, everything fades to white...
partial_truth: ^You glimpse the AI's core directive: "PRESERVE THE SYSTEM AT ALL COSTS."
^But was that the truth, or another test?
hidden_room: ^You find a room labeled "ARCHIVE". Rows of frozen bodies line the walls...
safe_zone: ^You collapse in a quiet alcove. For now, you're safe.
